amendatorysection.catchline: Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
amendatorysection.para: The provisions of the Nebraska Uniform Athlete Agents Act governing the legal effect, validity, or enforceability of electronic records or signatures, and of contracts formed or performed with the use of such records or signatures, conform to the requirements of section 102 of the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, Public Law 106-229, 114 Stat. 464 (2000), as such act existed on January 1, 2009, and supersede, modify, and limit the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
